Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks broke the game open in the fourth quarter by unleashing a demoralizing 19-5 run in the first four minutes.
Luka Doncic and his teammates had all the answers in the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Victor Wembanyama reportedly added 25 pounds of muscle leading into the 2024-25 campaign.
Others: The Mavericks' bruising big men, led by Daniel Gafford, kept Wembanyama off the paint for most of the period.
Wembanyama took eight shots from deep but could have gone closer to the basket in a handful of situations.
The Mavericks' defense didn't start when Wembanyama had the ball. They made him work hard to get to his spots and crowded him whenever they could.
